resources.string:
"x = x₀ + vt + 1/2 * a * t²

Where:
- x = final position
- x₀ = initial position
- v = average velocity
- a = acceleration
- t = time"

"v = v₀ + at

Where:
- v = final velocity
- v₀ = initial velocity
- a = acceleration
- t = time"

"v² = v₀² + 2aΔx

Where:
- v = final velocity
- v₀ = initial velocity
- a = acceleration
- Δx = change in position (x - x₀)"

"x = x₀ + (v + v₀) * t / 2

Where:
- x = final position
- x₀ = initial position
- v = final velocity
- v₀ = initial velocity
- t = time"
